name: American Speedway
description:
Compete in racing circuits at speeds in excess of 250 mph. Experience the adrenaline rush in the spectacular oval nascar style circuits of each of the states: California, Tenneesse, Darlington, Florida, Dover, Madison, Carolina, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Texas and many more.

Adjust yourself in each race. It will not be easy, the weather can change at any time and the pit entry at the right time and proper tire selection can make the difference between winning or remaining the last.

You have six different types of tires, hard, medium, soft, super soft, intermediate rain and extreme rain. Learn to use them at the right time and become the best strategist on the track.

Select the type of motor map during the race. Aggressive, balanced, conservative, each has its advantages and disadvantages. Learn to use them at the right time. The aggressive mode will increase the power of your vehicle but the expense of tires and gasoline will be greater.

During races, stick behind the fastest cars and take advantage of the drag to increase your speed.

Upgrade your car to the fullest and be the king of the ovals. Improves engine, transmission, exhaust system, brakes, tire compound, gasoline quality, suspension.
Improve your competition team. Train your mechanics to improve pit stop time.
